LanguageData.AimingDelayFactor.label: час прицілювання
LanguageData.AimingDelayFactor.description: How long it takes to shoot after choosing a target.
LanguageData.IncomingDamageFactor.label: incoming damage multiplier
LanguageData.IncomingDamageFactor.description: A multiplier on all incoming damage.
LanguageData.MeleeArmorPenetration.label: пробиття броні в ближньому бою
LanguageData.MeleeArmorPenetration.description: Average armor penetration of all attacks in melee combat.\n\nThis stat includes currently used weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChance.label: можливість ухилитися в ближньому бою
LanguageData.MeleeDodgeChance.description: Chance to dodge a melee attack that would've otherwise hit.\n\nCharacters will not dodge while aiming or firing a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeDPS.label: ШЗС у ближньому бої
LanguageData.MeleeDPS.description: Average damage per second in melee combat.\n\nThis stat ignores target defenses like dodging and armor.
LanguageData.MeleeHitChance.label: шанс удару в бл. бою
LanguageData.MeleeHitChance.description: Chance to hit a target in melee.\n\nThe target can still dodge even if we would've hit.
LanguageData.PawnTrapSpringChance.label: шанс пастки на активацію
LanguageData.PawnTrapSpringChance.description: Chance to spring a trap the character is unaware of.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyPawn.label: точність стрільби
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracyPawn.description:
Base chance to not miss per cell of shot distance.

Chance to hit is also affected by many other factors.

A hit chance explanation for any shot can be seen by selecting a shooter and mousing over a target.
